ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_1_TITlE: All your Bitcoin, Stacks assets and NFTs in one place
ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_1_SUBTITlE: Manage all your Bitcoin and Stacks based digital assets directly from Xverse
ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_2_TITlE: Stack your STX to earn rewards in Bitcoin
ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_2_SUBTITlE: Earn Bitcoin yield on your STX without them ever leaving your wallet.
ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_3_TITlE: Access your favorites Dapps from your wallet
ONBOARDING_SCREEN.ONBOARDING_3_SUBTITlE: From marketplaces to DeFi, and so much more.

LEDGER_IMPORT_SCREEN.LEDGER_IMPORT_1_SUBTITLE: Connecting a Ledger hardware wallet to Xverse is the most secure way to store your Bitcoin, Ordinals, BRC-20 tokens and more.
LEDGER_IMPORT_SCREEN.LEDGER_IMPORT_2_SUBTITLE: You can create multiple wallets to store Bitcoin, Ordinals and BRC-20 tokens.

LEDGER_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Bitcoin app.
LEDGER_CONNECT.STX_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Stacks app.
LEDGER_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorised by your browser and the Bitcoin app is open.
LEDGER_CONNECT.STX_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorised by your browser and the Stacks app is open.

LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.SUBTITLE: This is the address generated by the hardware wallet. Verify that this address matches the address displayed on your device.
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.ALERT: Verify that these addresses match the addresses displayed on the device.
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.ALREADY_CONNECTED_WARNING: An account has already been added to your wallet from this device. Would you like to create a new account?
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.CONFIRM_TO_CONTINUE: Confirm on your device to continue.
LEDGER_ADD_ADDRESS.SUBTITLE_CANCELLED: The account import process was cancelled on the device.

LEDGER_ADDRESS_ADDED.SUBTITLE: You can now receive & send Bitcoin, Ordinals and BRC-20 tokens using Xverse and Ledger.
LEDGER_ADDRESS_ADDED.SUBTITLE_STX: You can now receive & send Stacks tokens using Xverse and Ledger.

LEDGER_ADD_ACCOUNT_NAME.TITLE: Name your Ledger wallet
LEDGER_ADD_ACCOUNT_NAME.SUBTITLE: This is the address generated by your device.

LEDGER_IMPORT_END.TITLE: Your wallet is ready!
LEDGER_IMPORT_END.SUBTITLE: You can switch to this wallet from the accounts selection drop-down.

LEDGER_BEFORE_GETTING_STARTED.TITLE: Before getting started
LEDGER_BEFORE_GETTING_STARTED.DESCRIPTION: Do you use Ledger Live with the hardware wallet device you wish to connect?

OPTIONS.USE_LEDGER_LIVE: I use Ledger Live with the device.
OPTIONS.DONT_USE_LEDGER_LIVE: I do not use Ledger Live with the device.

IMPORTANT_WARNING.TITLE: Important - Please read
IMPORTANT_WARNING.TEXT_1: It is not recommended to use Xverse and Ledger Live, or other Bitcoin wallets with the same hardware device as this could lead to unintentional transfers of Ordinals.
IMPORTANT_WARNING.TEXT_2: You should use a separate device for Xverse and Ordinals or set a passphrase on your Ledger to create a different set of accounts for Xverse. See
IMPORTANT_WARNING.TEXT_3: Only continue if you're an advanced user and you know what you're doing. Do not create and use a taproot address on Ledger Live if you are using Xverse.
IMPORTANT_WARNING.PASSPHRASE_FOR_ORDINALS: How To Set A Passphrase For Ordinals
IMPORTANT_WARNING.UNDERSTAND_THE_RISKS: I understand the risks and wish to continue anyway
IMPORTANT_WARNING.UNDERSTAND_SHOULD_NOT_USE_LEDGER_LIVE: I understand I should not use Ledger Live or other Bitcoin wallets with the same hardware device

LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.SUBTITLE_VERIFY: Verify that this address matches the address displayed on your device.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.BTC_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Do not send Ordinals to this address, use your Ordinals NFT receive address.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.ORDINALS_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only send Ordinals and BRC-20 tokens to this address.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.SUBTITLE_CANCELLED: The account address was rejected on the device.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.BTC_SUBTITLE_FAILED: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorised by your browser and the Bitcoin app is open.
LEDGER_VERIFY_SCREEN.WRONG_DEVICE_ERROR_SUBTITLE: The public key of the connected device did not match the wallet public key. Make sure you have the correct device connected.

LEDGER_CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Bitcoin app.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect your hardware wallet
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: To continue, connect and unlock your device.
CONNECT.BTC_SUBTITLE: To continue, connect your Ledger device, make sure it's unlocked, and open the Bitcoin app.
CONNECT.BTC_ERROR_SUBTITLE: Make sure your Ledger device is connected, unlocked, authorised by your browser and the Bitcoin app is open.
CONNECT.WRONG_DEVICE_ERROR_SUBTITLE: The public key of the connected device did not match the wallet public key. Make sure you have the correct device connected.

EXTERNAL_INPUTS.TITLE: External inputs
EXTERNAL_INPUTS.SUBTITLE: Your device may display a warning regarding external inputs. This is expected as you'll be signing inputs from two addresses in one transaction.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm transaction
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Confirm the transaction on your device to continue.
CONFIRM.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The transaction has been rejected. You can try again or close this tab.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Transaction broadcasted
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: Your transaction has been successfully broadcasted. You can close this tab.

DASHBOARD_SCREEN.REMOVE_FROM_LIST_DESCRIPTION: This will disconnect and remove the account from Xverse. You can import the same account again later by reconnecting your hardware wallet device.

RECEIVE.STX_ADDRESS_DESC: Only send SIP-010 tokens to this address
RECEIVE.ORDINALS_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Only send Ordinals and BRC-20 tokens to this address.
RECEIVE.BTC_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: Do not send Ordinals to this address, use your Ordinals NFT receive address.

SEND.MEMO_INFO: Adding a memo can have an impact on the transaction fee
SEND.NO_FUNDS: You don’t have any funds to send.

ERRORS.BELOW_MINIMUM_AMOUNT: Amount should not be less than 1500 sats
ERRORS.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE_FEES: Insufficient balance when including transaction fees
ERRORS.NFT_SEND_DETAIL: This Nft is already sent and is in pending state
ERRORS.ORDINAL_NOT_OWNED: This ordinal is not owned by your active account

SEND.SEND_ORDINAL_WALLET_WARNING: You are about to transfer an Ordinal. Make sure the recipient wallet supports Ordinals.
SEND.SEND_BRC20_ORDINAL_WALLET_WARNING: Transferring this Ordinal inscription will initiate the transfer of your BRC-20 tokens.
SEND.SEND_ORDINAL_TO_SELF_WARNING: You are about to transfer an Ordinal to yourself
SEND.SEND_BRC20_ORDINAL_TO_SELF_WARNING: You are about to transfer BRC-20 tokens to yourself
SEND.SEND_BTC_TO_SELF_WARNING: You are about to transfer BTC to yourself

CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.SPONSORED_TX_INFO: This is a sponsored transaction, no transaction fees will be deducted from your account.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.NETWORK_MISMATCH: There’s a mismatch between your active network and the network you’re logged with.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.ADDRESS_MISMATCH: There’s a mismatch between your signing address and the address you’re logged with.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.PSBT_NO_BROADCAST_DISCLAIMER: This transaction will not be broadcasted from your wallet. It may be broadcasted later by a third party.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.PSBT_CANT_PARSE_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: The requested transaction is invalid and cannot be processed please contact the developer of the requesting app for support
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.ORDINAL_DETECTED_WARNING: Ordinal inscription detected in transaction. Continuing will cause your ordinal to be transferred away.
CONFIRM_TRANSACTION.BTC_TRANSFER_DANGER_ALERT_DESC: You are about to make a Bitcoin transfer which contains an ordinal inscription. Once transferred out of the wallet, you will not be able to recover them.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect your hardware wallet
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: To continue, plug and unlock your device.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE: We haven’t been able to connect to your device.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm the transaction
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Authorise the transaction on your device to continue.
CONFIRM.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The transaction have been rejected. You can try again or close this tab.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Transaction broadcasted
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: Your transaction have been successfully broadcasted. You can close this tab.

TX_ERRORS.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: The requested transaction cannot be created due to insufficient balance
TX_ERRORS.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE_FEES: Insufficient balance when including transaction fees

TRANSACTION_SETTING.FEE_INFO: Apply a higher fee to help your transaction confirm quickly, especially when the network is congested.
TRANSACTION_SETTING.NONCE_INFO: You can use a custom nonce to replace a pending transaction with the same nonce.
TRANSACTION_SETTING.SAME_FEE_ERROR: New fee must be greater than current fee
TRANSACTION_SETTING.GREATER_FEE_ERROR: Fee is more than available balance
TRANSACTION_SETTING.NONCE_WARNING: Entering an erronous nonce can result in a failed transaction. Only apply changes if you know what you are doing.

TRANSACTION_STATUS.SUCCESS_MSG: Your transaction has been successfully submitted.
TRANSACTION_STATUS.SPONSORED_MSG: This transaction will be broadcasted by the sponsor
TRANSACTION_STATUS.BRC20_ORDINAL_MSG: The inscription may take up to several hours to appear in your wallet. Once received, head to your collectible dashboard and send it to your recipient to complete the token transfer.
TRANSACTION_STATUS.SPONSOR_SERVICE_ERROR: If the issue persist, try again at a later time, or uncheck the “Sponsor Transaction” option in the swap details.

LEGAL_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Please review the Xverse Wallet Privacy Policy and Terms of Services.

BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Your seedphrase is the unique key that allows you to recover your wallet.
BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.SEED_PHRASE_VIEW_HEADING: Write down your seed phrase and make sure to keep it private. This is the unique key to your wallet.
BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.SEED_PHRASE_VERIFY_HEADING: Write your seedphrase to confirm you saved it properly.
BACKUP_WALLET_SCREEN.CONFIRM_YOUR_SEEDPHRASE: Confirm you've recorded your seed phrase correctly.

CREATE_PASSWORD_SCREEN.CREATE_PASSWORD_TITLE: Enter a password to protect your wallet
CREATE_PASSWORD_SCREEN.PASSWORD_STRENGTH_ERROR: Your password should be at least 9 characters long. Use a mix of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and symbols
CREATE_PASSWORD_SCREEN.CONFIRM_PASSWORD_MATCH_ERROR: Please make sure your passwords match

WALLET_SUCCESS_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Your new wallet has been created successfully, you can now connect to your wallet.
WALLET_SUCCESS_SCREEN.RESTORE_SCREEN_SUBTITLE: Your wallet has been successfully restored.

WALLET_EXISTS_SCREEN.SCREEN_SUBTITLE: A wallet was created or restored in another tab. Any seed phrases generated in this tab will not be valid. If unsure, please create a new wallet or restore from your backed up seed phrase.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect your hardware wallet
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: To continue, plug and unlock your device.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE: We haven’t been able to connect to your device.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm the signature
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Authorise the signature on your device to continue.
CONFIRM.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The signatures has been rejected. You can try again or close this tab.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Signature confirmed
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: This transaction will be broadcasted by the sponsor.

FORGOT_PASSWORD_SCREEN.TITLE: Forgot Password
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SCREEN.PARAGRAPH1: Xverse does not keep a copy of your password. If you're unable to access your account, you will need to reset your wallet and input the seedphrase you used when you generated your wallet.
FORGOT_PASSWORD_SCREEN.PARAGRAPH2: This will reset your wallet from this browser. Make sure you have your seed phrase backed up.

RESTORE_WALLET_SCREEN.ENTER_SEED_HEADER: Enter your seedphrase to restore your wallet.
RESTORE_WALLET_SCREEN.SEED_INPUT_ERROR: Invalid seed phrase, please try again

STACKING_SCREEN.STACKING_INFO: Pool your STX with other stackers to earn real BTC with low minimums. Rewards are distributed after the end of every 2-week cycle.
STACKING_SCREEN.STACK_FOR_REWARD: Stack your coins to earn rewards
STACKING_SCREEN.XVERSE_POOL: Xverse delegated pooling allows everyone to participate in Stacking and earn rewards.
STACKING_SCREEN.NO_EARN_OPTION: No Earn options currently available for this wallet type.

NFT_DASHBOARD_SCREEN.ACTIVATE_ORDINALS_INFO: You have Bitcoin Ordinals in your wallet. Would you like to display them? This is an experimental feature. You can change this setting at anytime.

RESTORE_FUND_SCREEN.TITLE: Restore assets
RESTORE_FUND_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: If you sent Ordinals to your Bitcoin payment address or Bitcoin to your ordinals address, you can recover it and send it to the correct address.
RESTORE_FUND_SCREEN.RECOVER_BTC_DESC: If you sent Bitcoin to your Ordinals address.
RESTORE_FUND_SCREEN.RECOVER_ORDINALS_DESC: If you sent Ordinals to your Bitcoin payment address.

RESTORE_BTC_SCREEN.TITLE: Restore BTC
RESTORE_BTC_SCREEN.NO_FUNDS: You don’t have any funds stored on your ordinal address.
RESTORE_BTC_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: You have Bitcoin stored in your ordinal address. You can transfer them to your payment address so they can be used for payments and are shown in your balance.

RESTORE_ORDINAL_SCREEN.TITLE: Restore Ordinals
RESTORE_ORDINAL_SCREEN.NO_FUNDS: You don’t have any Ordinals stored on your Bitcoin payment address.
RESTORE_ORDINAL_SCREEN.DESCRIPTION: You have Ordinals stored in your Bitcoin payment address. You can transfer them to your Ordinals address so that they show up in your collection.

NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.NAME: Name
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.CREATOR: Creator
NFT_DETAIL_SCREEN.ORDINAL_PENDING_SEND_DESCRIPTION: This Ordinal is already in a pending transfer.

RESET_WALLET_SCREEN.ENTER_PASSWORD: Enter your password to reset your wallet

SETTING_SCREEN.RESET_WALLET_DESCRIPTION: This will reset your wallet from this browser. Make sure you have your seed phrase backed up.
SETTING_SCREEN.BACKUP_WALLET_UNLOCK_SEED: Enter your password to reveal your seedphrase
SETTING_SCREEN.ENTER_PASSWORD: Enter your password to reset your wallet
SETTING_SCREEN.LOCK_COUNTDOWN_TITLE: Select the time duration before the wallet locks automatically.

BUY_SCREEN.PURCHASE_CRYPTO: Purchase crypto quickly and deposit directly into your Xverse wallet.
BUY_SCREEN.THIRD_PARTY_WARNING: You will be redirected to a third-party service provider to complete the purchase. If you encounter any issues during the process please contact the provider.

POST_CONDITION_MESSAGE.TRANSFER_GREATER_EQUAL: will transfer equal to or greater than
POST_CONDITION_MESSAGE.TRANSFER_LESS_EQUAL: will transfer less than or equal to

CONTRACT_CALL_REQUEST.POST_CONDITION_ALERT: No transfers (beside fees) will be made from your account or the transaction will abort

DEPLOY_CONTRACT_REQUEST.POST_CONDITION_ALERT: No transfers (beside fees) will be made from your account or the transaction will abort

SIGNATURE_REQUEST.TITLE: Sign Message
SIGNATURE_REQUEST.ACTION_DISCLAIMER: No transactions will be broadcasted and no fees will be applied.
SIGNATURE_REQUEST.SIGNING_WARNING: By signing this message, you prove that you are the owner of an account without broadcasting any on chain transactions. This signature cannot be used to send transactions on your behalf. You should only sign messages you trust.

CONNECT.TITLE: Connect your hardware wallet
CONNECT.SUBTITLE: To continue, plug and unlock your device.
CONNECT.ERROR_SUBTITLE: We haven’t been able to connect to your device.

CONFIRM.TITLE: Confirm the signature
CONFIRM.SUBTITLE: Authorise the signature on your device to continue.
CONFIRM.ERROR_SUBTITLE: The signatures has been rejected. You can try again or close this tab.

SUCCESS.TITLE: Signature confirmed
SUCCESS.SUBTITLE: This transaction will be broadcasted by the sponsor.

ERROR_SCREEN.TITLE: Xverse crashed unexpectedly
ERROR_SCREEN.ERROR_DESCRIPTION: Xverse encountered a fatal error and crashed. You need to relaunch your wallet.
ERROR_SCREEN.SUPPORT: If the issue persists, you can contact the support at

WINDOW_CLOSED_ALERT.TITLE: Requesting window closed
WINDOW_CLOSED_ALERT.BODY: The window that initiated the request is closed, but you can still broadcast the transaction

ADDRESS_RECEIVE_ALERT_MESSAGE.RECEIVING_ORDINAL_INFO: Use this address to receive Ordinals only. Do not use this address to receive Bitcoin payments.
ADDRESS_RECEIVE_ALERT_MESSAGE.RECEIVING_BTC_INFO: Use this address to receive Bitcoin payments only. Do not use this address to receive Ordinals & BRC-20 tokens.
ADDRESS_RECEIVE_ALERT_MESSAGE.DO_NOT_SHOW_MESSAGE: Do not show this message again

SELECT_BTC_ADDRESS_SCREEN.TITLE: Bitcoin Address Request
SELECT_BTC_ADDRESS_SCREEN.NETWORK_MISMATCH_ERROR_DESCRIPTION: The app is requesting your wallet address for a different network. You may have to switch your active network in wallet settings.

SEND_BRC_20.SEND_INFO_SUBTITLE: To transfer BRC-20 tokens, you need to make two separate transactions:
SEND_BRC_20.SEND_STEP_1: Create an Ordinal inscription with the token and amount you would like to send.
SEND_BRC_20.SEND_STEP_2: Once you have the transfer inscription, you can send it to your recipient to transfer the BRC-20 token.

CACHE_MIGRATION_SCREEN.TITLE: Your wallet data store needs to be updated in order to remain secure.
CACHE_MIGRATION_SCREEN.WARNING: Please make sure you have your seed phrase backed up securely before moving forward.

SWAP_SCREEN.SLIPPAGE_DESC: Your transaction will reverse if the price changes unfavorably by more of this percentage.
SWAP_SCREEN.SWAP_TRANSACTION_CANNOT_BE_SPONSORED: Swap transaction cannot be sponsored while you have a pending transaction.

SWAP_CONFIRM_SCREEN.THIS_IS_A_SPONSORED_TRANSACTION: This is a sponsored transaction, no transaction fees will be deducted from your account.
SWAP_CONFIRM_SCREEN.SWAP_TRANSACTION_CANNOT_BE_SPONSORED: Swap transaction cannot be sponsored while you have a pending transaction.
